original_text: But that ye must turn away this day from following the Lord? and it will be, seeing ye rebel to day against the Lord, that to morrow he will be wroth with the whole congregation of Israel.
korean_text: 오늘 너희가 돌이켜 여호와를 따르지 아니하려고 하느냐 너희가 오늘 여호와를 배역하면 내일은 그가 이스라엘 온 회중에게 진노하시리라

sentences.original_text: But that ye must turn away this day
and it will be, seeing ye rebel to day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 있을 것이니, 보라 너희가 오늘 반역하는 것을

sentences.original_text: that to morrow he will be wroth
with the whole congregation of Israel.
